name: GrappleBot (King_Of_Axolotls_4466)
description:
In Grapple Bot, you control a tiny robot that can move and grapple. Navigate through normal and challenge modes to reach the end.
Font used by Tiny World here on Itch.io
everything else is made by me

Controls:

A, D: Move Grapple Bot left and right

Left Click: Grapple on/off

Space: deploy drone

W,A,S,D: Move done

ESC: to menu
